text: Hi guys, I am building this global header and added an 'export to template context' icon field for them to choose their search icon in the template partial. I'm getting this error on the content section of any template with the global header. Never seen it before and was wondering if anyone knows of a fix for it. It doesn't seem to actually break anything on the page, but it is annoying in the editor and I don't want my client to have to deal with it.
Hey <@U01DQEZ7BCZ>! Mind sharing your field HubL? Wondering if you have a  `label` set, which could be the issue.
Yup, I do. Here it is:
btw, This is what the fields look like in the global editor. I'm wondering if it's just a bug on HubSpots end. Because here, where the field actually is supposed to show, it is showing correctly.
Ahh, yeah, Iâ€™d think so then. That kind of missing translation is usually on the product side (was just double checking with the label), so giving support a shout might be the best move!
Awesome, Thanks for the feedback! I'll reach out to them right away.
